Do you guys know how to prevent the message app spam in Breaking Ground when a seismic station doesn't have communication link to KSC? I added a real relay satellite a little too late. Strange I had enough power to run the experiments and the Goo experiment don't spam those messages...

Spammed around 9000 messages and I can't open the app anymore, it makes the gaùme lag as Hell.

Does the game option to turn off the message app is taken into account on next save load?

I took a save file and manually deleted all messages, let's hope that I haven(t screwed up.

6 minutes ago, Quoniam Kerman said:

Do you guys know how to prevent the message app spam in Breaking Ground when a seismic station doesn't have communication link to KSC?

Not quite appropriate for "What did you do in KSP today?", but there's a mod for this.  Doesn't have a forum topic, but here's its GitHub page:

https://github.com/JarredAllen/ksp-StopBreakingGroundNotificationSpam

 

Edited September 16, 2019 by Jacke

Breaking Ground question moved to the Breaking Ground subforum. 

Unfortunately, there is no fix for this yet.
